cache_dir = check_cache()
fe = FeatureVectorizer(cache_dir=cache_dir, mode='w')
fe.setup(column_ids=[1, 3])
with pytest.raises(ValueError, match=
    '.*can only be privided using `dataset_definition.*'):
    fe.ingest(csv_data_dir)
with pytest.raises(ValueError, match='.*one CSV can be provided at a time.*'):
    fe.ingest(dataset_definition=[{'file_path': os.path.join(csv_data_dir,
        'example.csv')}, {'file_path': os.path.join(csv_data_dir,
        'example.csv')}])
